meanings.definition: The act of shipping goods or cargo.
meanings.sent1: The shipment of new products arrived at the store today.
meanings.sent2: The online store offers free shipment for orders over $50.
meanings.sent3: The shipment of party supplies made everyone excited for the upcoming event.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a shipment of joy that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The shipment of books was so heavy, it felt like carrying a mountain.

meanings.definition: A quantity of goods or cargo shipped at one time.
meanings.sent1: The large shipment of bananas filled the entire warehouse.
meanings.sent2: The company received a huge shipment of new computers for their employees.
meanings.sent3: The shipment of candy was so massive, it looked like a sweet mountain.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was a shipment of happiness that spread to everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The shipment of furniture was so big, it took two trucks to deliver it all.
